title: Unemployment Assistance for Contractors Guide?
text:
I've been having a lot of fellow contractors ask me how this works since its normally the sort of thing I am up on.  However, I can't make heads of tails of this now, and am wondering if there's some guide somewhere someone has already put together.

Independent contractors who would normally not get unemployment are granted some help from the PUA and that's being administered through WA State's unemployment assistance office.

Anyone have a clear guide to navigating this?
